arts.ttl: 'Going to be miserable' - fuming Portsmouth boss makes promise after defeat at Preston North End
arts.sum: John Mousinho has promised the next two weeks will be ‘miserable’ for his Pompey players.

arts.ttl: ‘There was’ - The honest verdict from Portsmouth dressing room after Preston North End disappointment
arts.sum: Cohen Bramall has revealed there were some hard words spoken in the Pompey dressing room at full-time against Preston.

arts.ttl: 'I’ve been far too nice to these players for too long': Furious Portsmouth boss blasts 'abysmal' late defeat at Preston
arts.sum: A furious John Mousinho blasted Pompey’s ‘abysmal’ defeat at Preston and insisted: I’ve been far too nice to these players for too long.

arts.ttl: 'Disastrous weekend. We're in trouble. Concerning' - Fratton faithful all say same thing as Portsmouth are beaten at Preston North End
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to Pompey’s 2-1 defeat at Preston North End.

arts.ttl: 'A new Fratton hero, Frustratingly sluggish, Replaced by an imposter': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against Preston
arts.sum: Pompey suffered late agony at Preston with an agonising defeat.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth suffer late heartbreak against Preston North End as survival hopes take hit
arts.sum: Pompey suffered late heartbreak at the hands of Preston North End.

arts.ttl: Stefan Teitur Thordarson ends Preston’s six-match winless run against Portsmouth
arts.sum: The Iceland international scored with three minutes remaining to seal Preston’s first Championship victory in over a month.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth fans left confused by same thing as team named to face Preston North End
arts.sum: If you’re looking at the Pompey teamsheet ahead of today’s game against Preston North and feeling a bit confused, don’t worry – you’re not alone!

arts.ttl: Portsmouth boss springs selection - and positional - surprises as he freshens up Blues against Preston
arts.sum: John Mousinho has freshened up his Pompey team for this afternoon’s trip to Preston.

arts.ttl: Preston North End v Portsmouth LIVE: Build-up, team news and gossip as Blues make long trip to Deepdale
arts.sum: Pompey make the long trip north to face Preston North End this afternoon.
